description: If you like something sweet for breakfast, try this toastie. Fruit toast is layered with banana and choc hazelnut spread for an indulgent brekkie treat.
name: Fruit Loaf Toastie with Banana & Choc Hazelnut Spread Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 slices Mighty Soft fruity-licious cranberry raspberry & spice Loaf

recipeInstructions.text: Butter one side of each slice of Mighty Soft Fruit Loaf Cafe Style bread.
Spread an even layer of choc hazelnut spread on the un-buttered side of raisin toast, top with banana coins.
Place remaining piece of raisin toast on top of the banana, buttered side up.
Place toastie on sandwich press and cook until crunchy and golden.
